command: until ping -c 1 -W 1 zk-hs > /dev/null; do echo Waiting for Zookeeper to be ready.; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-zookeeper

command: INDEX=${HOSTNAME##*-}; if [ $INDEX -ne 0 ]; then echo Only one master should be running.; exit 1; fi;
initContainers.name: start-only-one-dremio-master

command: until ping -c 1 -W 1 zk-hs > /dev/null; do echo Waiting for Zookeeper to be ready.; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: wait-for-zookeeper

command:
# obtain ZOO_MY_ID based on POD hostname
export HOST_NUMBER="${HOSTNAME##*-}"
export ZOO_MY_ID="$((HOST_NUMBER + 1))"
[ -z "${ZOO_MY_ID}" ] && echo "Failed to get index from hostname $HOSTNAME" && exit 1
echo "ZOO_MY_ID=${ZOO_MY_ID}"

# construct ZOO_SERVERS based on ensemble count
DOMAIN="$(hostname -d)"
SERVERS=3
for (( i=${SERVERS},j=i-1; i>=1; i--,j-- )); do ZOO_SERVERS="server.${i}=zk-${j}.${DOMAIN}:2888:3888;2181 ${ZOO_SERVERS}"; done
echo "ZOO_SERVERS=${ZOO_SERVERS}"
export ZOO_SERVERS

/docker-entrypoint.sh
zkServer.sh start-foreground
containers.name: kubernetes-zookeeper
